resources.string:
I am a technophile who is constantly exploring new diverse fields. I am developing myself on many levels: Practicing CP to enhance my design thinking skills; Encountering different /platforms such as AR/Unity, Django, Android Studio. And I am always looking for something new to learn. 

 I am interested in diverse fields. I love development, I am passionate about automating task we, humans, do using innovative technologies. Also, I am very interested in Quantum Computing especially its effects on the current cyber security technologies. I am an innovative person. I try to always look at problems from different angles. I have experience in various fields such as: AR with Unity , Backend Development with Django, C++ ,OOP, Java and Android development.And I am always passionate to explore new fields in Technology.I am a team player and good at communicating with others.
